document_title: ZebOS routing remote shell service enabled

note.text: A remote attacker may access the internal ZebOS shell of FortiOS 5.2.3 without authentication on the HA ("High Availability") dedicated management interface only. Only FortiGates configured with HA *and* with an enabled HA dedicated management interface are vulnerable. Note: when a FortiGate is configured to use HA, the dedicated management interface is disabled by default .
note.title: Description

note.text: FortiOS 5.2.3 must be upgraded to FortiOS 5.2.4.FortiOS 5.2.2 and lower are not affected.FortiOS 5.0.12 and lower are not affected.As a workaround the LAN access to the HA interface may be filtered by a transit firewall or not routed.
note.title: Solutions

vulnerability.title: ZebOS routing remote shell service enabled
